com.sportradar.unifiedodds.sdk.cfg

Class UofConfigurationImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sportradar.unifiedodds.sdk.cfg.UofConfigurationImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UofConfiguration

    public class UofConfigurationImpl
extends Object
implements UofConfiguration
    This class is used to specify various configuration parameters for a session to the Sportradar system(s)

        public Locale getDefaultLanguage()
        Description copied from interface: UofConfiguration
        The locale used for any getter that returns localized Strings. (i.e. Sport name, Tournament name, Team name, Player name etc). The locale is English if not specified.
        Specified by:
